comments:
I looked at error log and accidentally saw 14 entries like this. By examining the timestamp and the stack trace, looks like it happened all at once at startup.

-- Error Log --
Date: Sun Nov 18 02:30:30 BRST 2007
Message: Could not process activity event
Severity: Error
Plugin ID: org.eclipse.mylyn
Stack Trace:
